name: Dirty Vampires - An RPG Tower Defence Adventure
name_original: Dirty Vampires - An RPG Tower Defence Adventure
description:
A fun Tower Defence type game with RPG elements.
Balance resource collecting towers with offensive fighters to hold the enemy off in each level.
Spend your gold between battles to upgrade your towers and fighters to suit your strategy.
Expand your village and unlock new NPC's as you progress.

Earn XP for your Hero to unlock perks which empower your fighters.
Use gold to unlock abilities for your fighters as well as increasing their health, attack rate, and damage.
Explore the village between battles to unlock more fighters, upgrades,

All upgrades are permanent and so with enough gold and upgrades, no level is impossible.
